Throw it in the fire to get a portal to the Teleportation core of the same name
advancement.cc2001_floo_powder.get_porta: Use a named Teleport Flint and Steel to activate and name the teleportation core
advancement.cc2001_floo_powder.into_fire: Enter the teleport flame and try to teleport
chat.cc2001_floo_powder.point_has_not_be: The teleportation point has not been loaded yet
chat.cc2001_floo_powder.use_portal_flint: Use Teleport Flint and Steel to light up the core
